attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring more pressure on European Government to ensure countries police correctly the "expatriates" UK registered vehicles on European Roads. Over the past year an unofficial trawl of UK plated cars/vans etc has been made in one particular area of France resulting in some 350 UK plated cars being identified without road tax.  Revenue is being lost in UK both the actual tax and bench fines issued for non taxing. Could not the UK governemnt issue aide memories to European Police Forces to check UK vehicles and what should be carried as proof of compliance.

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence "Mark Evans, Mel Evans" to an action for HM Government i.e. We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to... "Bring more pressure on European Government to ensure countries police correctly the "expatriates" UK registered vehicles on European Roads."
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
